title: Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         Lemon House and a portion of Level No. 6. National Park Service  Park Grounds: Park grounds are open seven days a week from sunrise to sunset. Park Buildings: The Summit Level Visitor Center, Engine House No. 6 Exhibit Shelter, and the Lemon House are open seven days a week from 9:00 am-5:00 pm.  Park hours can change due to holidays and inclement weather. If traveling a great distance you may want to call the park for operating hours. The visitor center desk telephone number is (814) 886-6150.
